ProductInfo.Features:
Allows for easy surveying of small, hard-to-reach places.
Mini 9mm waterproof LED lens, 2 meter flexible tube.
3.5" TFT-LCD detachable/mountable monitor, built-in rechargeable Li-battery.
Video recording capability, supports up to 32GB microSD card. 3 useful accessories included: Hook, mirror and magnet.
Package Included: 1 x Camera, 1 x Handle, 1 x LCD Monitor, 1 x Power Adapter, 1 x Video Output Cable, 1 x USB Cable, 1 x CD-ROM, 1 x Hook, 1 x Magnet, 1 x Mirror.
ProductInfo.Name: Waterproof Recordable Endoscope Inspection Camera Detachable LCD Monitor Observation Pipe Tube (6 ft, 9mm LED Lens)
